fathom.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a unit for measuring the depth of water, equal to six feet or about 1.8 metres
fathom.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to understand what something means after thinking about it carefully
fathom.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: I still can’t fathom out what she meant.
Mark couldn’t fathom why she resented him so much.
